summary: Shreyas discovers the magic of love and friendship in college days; only to be perplexed with the choices to be made.
cast: Swwapnil Joshi|Ankush Chaudhari|Urmila Kanitkar|Sai Tamhankar|Jitendra Joshi|Sushant Shellar|Sandeep Kulkarni|Richa Pariyalli|Anand Abhyankar|Nagesh Bhonsle|Rajesh Bhosle|Shrirang Deshmukh|Ajinkya Joshi|Nitesh Kalbande|Kasim Pishori|Pranav Raorane|Uday Sabnis|Sushant Shelar|Yogesh Shirsat|Uday Tikekar|Varsha Usgaonkar
title: Duniyadari
